column5: Well I wasn't able to find a replacement body housing for my old Cannon Mag 10, the parts were discontinued and none to be found 2nd hand, so I spent the cash to by a new Cannon Mag10, and man are they fast. And the stop feature at waterline is awesome.  My inaugural run with it was a complete success, with 3 kept and another 8 released, action was fast and furious but shut down when the rain picked up, which is weird because the trouts have never been affected by rain to me before.  he's a couple of the keepers.    This one came up from 140'down in 160 fow   Destined for the smoker..lol   This one pulled 50' of line twice before hitting the net.  Great day again on the water
Awesome stuff.  Some beauty summer lakers
Nice fish! I bet those are going to taste great!
Very cool...  Your all over those trout....  I'm jealous...
Congrats on your rigger fishing success!  I hope you have better luck with your Cannon, the first thing to break down on those is the auto stop.
My auto stops have worked on my cannons since we got them 5 years ago.
